Creator Of Homesite Interview

26 Aug 1999

Nick Bradbury is the creator of the extremely popular HTML editor, HomeSite. He sold HomeSite to Allaire (makers of ColdFusion) and worked with them for awhile, but now he's back on his own and has a new product that's determined to follow in HomeSite's footsteps and be the best in its class: TopStyle, a style sheet editor.

I managed to get an interview with Mr. Bradbury to ask him about his departure from Allaire, his new product, and the future of his company, Bradbury Software.

Read the full interview.
